name: Pixel Bombs
description:
Pixel Bombs is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while being bombarded with bombs. Use your mouse to click on exploding bombs and keep your lives for as long as possible. It's sure to be an explosively good time!

  • 3 Backgrounds
  • High-scores
  • Explosions
  • Blimps
  • Extra Lives (1-Ups)
